title: 服务器后台一直刷这问题
author: kxd2013
txt_content:
- [Server] WARN at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
- [Server] WARN at net.coreprotect.consumer.Consumer.run(Consumer.java:49)
- [Server] WARN at net.coreprotect.consumer.Process.processConsumer(Process.java:48)
- [Server] WARN at net.coreprotect.database.Database.prepareStatement(Database.java:209)
- [Server] WARN at net.coreprotect.database.Database.prepareStatement(Database.java:185)
- [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.Conn.prepareStatement(Conn.java:383)
- [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.Conn.prepareStatement(Conn.java:399)
- [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.Conn.prepareStatement(Conn.java:404)
- [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.PrepStmt.<init>(PrepStmt.java:42)
- [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.DB.prepare(DB.java:123)
- [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.NativeDB.prepare(Native Method)
- [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.DB.throwex(DB.java:374)
- [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:387)
- [Server] WARN at org.sqlite.DB.newSQLException(DB.java:383)
- [Server] WARN java.sql.SQLException: [SQLITE_ERROR] SQL error or missing database (no such table: co_block)

请问这是什么问题引起的！我个人看这是数据库出问题，那么哪位大大告诉我怎么修啊！！完全不懂啊！

replies.author: ysy960108
replies.txt_content:
首先，这只是一个WARN报错，不是ERROR，楼主多半可以无视掉
报错意思是在sqlite的文本数据库里找不到co_block的表，根据我的经验，是CoreProtect的数据库受损了，你可能近期手动删除了CO数据库文件，重启服务端即可解决。

replies.author: SakuraKooi
replies.txt_content:
删除coreprotect插件文件夹内database.db即可
co查询插件数据库损坏
记得删前先备份
